title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I try to view the scoped type hierarchy on a binary project (e.g. org.apache.ant), I receive the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant''. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars as well. However, I don't understand the meaning of this error message.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get an error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars when viewing the scoped type hierarchy of a binary project.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Open a binary project in the IDE.
2. Select a class (e.g. org.apache.ant) from the binary project.
3. Press F4 to view the scoped type hierarchy.
4. Observe the error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
